question: Which sportsperson has authored the book "Unstoppable: My Life So Far"?
explanation: The book \'Unstoppable: My Life So Far\' has been authored by tennis star Maria Sharapova. The book talks about Sharapovaâ€™s rise from nowhere to tennis stardom and the unending fight to stay on top. The book tells how a seventeen-year-old Maria Sharapova became an overnight sensation by defeating the two-time defending champion Serena Williams to win the prestigious Wimbledon.
